means: 敌人，仇敌( foe的名词复数 )

sentence.Network_en: They steadily pushed their foes before them.
She had fought many battles, vanquished many foes.
sentence.Network_cn: 她身经百战, 挫败过很多对手.

sentence.Network_en: It is perfectly clear who are our friends and who are our foes.

for a powerful but small country , in the midst of hostile peoples , deterrence means showing a readiness to fight andenough death and destruction so that foes think twice about attacking .对于一个强大但小，周围敌国林立的国家来说，威慑意味着表现出不畏战、不怕牺牲和不怕毁灭的精神，从而使得敌人在战前三思而行。
